content: Hello. My name is Serhiy and I am from Ukraine.You all probably know what is happening in my country. Yes, war.And that's why I don't have a home...You will ask why I am writing this to you. Because I am asking for your help.I am collecting funds in order to build a house, get back on my feet and start living anew, to be happy again and for my family to be happy.Cryptocurrency because it is the easiest way to get help from abroad, and I am asking abroad because there is no one to ask in my country.Please help me. I'm not asking to give me the last, I'm not asking to give me a lot, I'm asking for a little, as much as it's a pity.And I will be able to restore what was taken from me by Russia, that was taken from me by these inhumans.You will probably hate me for writing this here, but believe me, it won't get any worse.Please, help. I will be grateful for everyone's help. May the God protect you.BTC bc1q37y249r7er2g3fumgvkrklmjty334kmemwmc9wETH 0xFa9615FD041cE339d2E82436D61b6a6449eF7388

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Financial aid to the Ukraine military will dry up. All Putin has to do is wait a while. But this wait might take some time, and Putin might have to do a bit more destruction in Ukraine before the Ukraine military and government fall.The point? Where are you going to build? Certainly not in Ukraine until after the war is over. Or are you nuts?

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.created_time: October 18, 2022, 06:53:59 PMLast edit: October 19, 2022, 03:11:18 AM by Zlantann
comments.body: My dear friend Serhiy, you are welcome to the forum because I can see that this is your first post. It is quite unfortunate that you have to go through a lot of pain and hardship due to this war. My prayer is that very soon there would be a peaceful resolution to this crisis that has devastated many families.When you a new in an organization, it is important you spend some time learning the norms that exist there. This forum has rules and regulations that guide it so as to avoid lawlessness. And you just broke one of the rules. Begging is not allowed here. But it is also important to note that members in this forum support charity but it must be done through the right channels.How am I sure that you are Ukrainian? You might be a scammer that wants to use Ukraine as a means of getting money from members. Sorry if I am blunt but that's the truth. Scammers have used conflicts in Syria, Afghanistan, Libya, Palestine, etc to deceive people and collect donations. The only way people can donate funds is if they trust you and trust is not built in one day. The truth is nobody would believe your story here because they don't trust you.There is a part of the forum called beginners and help, I suggest you go to that section and learn more about the forum.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Looks like it is really time to get out of Ukraine.China orders citizens to leave Ukraine immediately, suggesting major war escalation by RussiaQuote from: https://www.naturalnews.com/2022-10-18-china-orders-citizens-leave-ukraine-immediately.html#China has ordered its remaining citizens in Ukraine to leave the country immediately, sparking fears that Russia is preparing to significantly ramp up its invasion.“With the current grim security situation in #Ukraine, China’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Chinese Embassy in Ukraine on Sat urge Chinese citizens in the country to enhance safety precautions and evacuate. The Embassy will assist in organizing the evacuation of people in need,” one Chinese diplomat wrote on Twitter over the weekend.Last week, Russia launched a two-day campaign of air and missile strikes targeting civilian infrastructure in Ukraine after an attack heavily damaged a vital bridge — Europe’s longest — connecting the Russian mainland with Crimea, which President Vladimir Putin ‘annexed’ in 2014 without firing a shot.Experts believe that the Chinese may have knowledge of Russian plans and as such, Beijing is making an effort to get its citizens out of harm’s way quickly ahead of new attacks.The Chinese foreign ministry and embassy warned of the “grave security situation” and ordered an immediate departure, going on to cite the need “to enhance safety precautions and evacuate.” The statement indicated that “the embassy will assist in organizing the evacuation of people in need.” Russian state sources also on Sunday began publicizing the new alert notification.China state media Global Times writes: “Some Chinese nationals still in Ukraine have signed up for evacuation from the country, with most registering for organized evacuations, while others are preparing to leave Ukraine on their own, the Global Times learned on Sunday, after the Chinese Foreign Ministry urged Chinese citizens to leave Ukraine, citing the grave security situation.”...

comments.author: White pawn
comments.body: Hey there. I’m as sympathetic as the next guy as to what’s happening in Ukraine. The senseless war has disrupted lives and displaced lots of people. You should first understand one thing; Absolutely no one would trust you using your words alone as you’re practically unknown on here. No one would hate you for writing this here, they mostly wouldn’t believe you. I know I don’t.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: I think the whole understands the situation on the ground on Ukraine's soil, that Ukrainian citizens need financial help. Posting your first post in this forum demanding financial help is a big foul for me because you are yet to be identified or recognized in this forum as a trusted member. If the forum members decide to render help to you today, someone else may also claim to be a Ukrainian citizen tomorrow just to ask us for financial help. By then, this forum will turn out to be where Ukrainians solicit financial help
